GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

topics.description: Code is love, code is life

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article with the specified article_id

article.title: Who Will Manage Your Club in 2021?
article.body: Managerial changes are too common in the modern day game. Already in the 16/17 season...
article.author: happyamy2016

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases/decreases the votes property of an article, responds with updated article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for selected article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: add a new comment to an article, returns new comment

GET api/users/:username.description: serves more detail about the requested user

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increases/decreases votes property of supplied comment
